author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower backer board tips over concrete…the first row of screws/washers has to go through concrete in this shower. I’m using Tapcons instead of the normal Schluter screws. I dimple the Tapcon/washer so that it can be waterproofed. But frequently this first row is covered by the shower tray. For more detailed tips and videos visit me at homerepairtutor.com 🔥#bathroomremodel #showerremodel #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
title: Shower Backer Board Tips for Concrete - #shorts #bathroomremodel #homerepairtutor
